似.definition: to seem; to appear; to resemble; similar; -like; pseudo-; (more) than

似地.definition: (used to form an adverbial phrase X + 似地[shi4de5]) like (X); as if (X); Taiwan pr. [si4de5]

似懂非懂.definition: to not really understand; to half-understand

似是而非.definition: apparently right but actually wrong; specious (idiom)

似曾相識.definition: déjà vu (the experience of seeing exactly the same situation a second time); seemingly familiar; apparently already acquainted

似的.definition: seems as if; rather like; Taiwan pr. [si4 de5]

似笑非笑.definition: like a smile yet not a smile (idiom)

似鯝.definition: Xenocyprioides, genus of cyprinid fish endemic to China
